function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased non-contact commercial activities in community life circles","Impact":"Potential increase in contagious disease transmission due to higher interaction in community areas","Mitigation":"Encourage the use of protective measures such as masks, hand hygiene, and social distancing","Technologies":"Contactless payment systems, online ordering and delivery platforms","People":"Community members, customers, employees, visitors","Owner":"Local government, commercial facility owners"},{"Description":"Reduced use frequency of physical facilities","Impact":"Impact on the business operations and revenue of physical facilities","Mitigation":"Diversification of services, improvement of in-store experience, and integration of online and offline channels","Technologies":"Improved e-commerce platforms, virtual reality (VR) experiences, and contactless technologies","People":"Business owners, facility managers, employees","Owner":"Business owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Consideration of non-contact commercial activities in the future","Impact":"Shift in consumer behavior towards non-contact commercial activities","Mitigation":"Education on public health measures, promoting the safety of in-person experiences, and enhancing the convenience of non-contact options","Technologies":"Social media campaigns, digital health passports, and customized loyalty programs","People":"Consumers, residents, community members","Owner":"Local government, business owners"}]}
